text: Ji Chaozhu (July 30, 1929 â€“ April 29, 2020) was a Chinese politician. He was the Ambassador to the Court of St. James's (United Kingdom) and an Undersecretary General of the United Nations. He retired in 1996. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:Ambassadors of China
